item.title: [COLOR skyblue]== B U S C A D O R E S ==[/COLOR][COLOR cyan] | [/COLOR][COLOR white][B]2018[/B][/COLOR][COLOR cyan] |[/COLOR]

regex.name: resolve
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import urlresolver def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): url = 'https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=[makelist.param1]' streamLink = urlresolver.resolve(url) return streamLink

regex.name: search
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction import requests,xbmcgui,xbmc, re,time, xbmcaddon def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):
text=takeInputFortext('Ingrese la búsqueda') url = 'https://www.youtube.com/results?q=' + text.replace(' ', '+') req = requests.get(url) list1 = re.findall('yt-lockup-c.+?a\shref=".watch.v=([^"]+)".+?\s\stitle="([^"]+)"\s', req.text)
count = 10 while count > 1: try: url = 'https://www.youtube.com' + re.findall('a href="([^"]+)".+<\/a>\n <\/div>', req.text)[0] except: return list1 req = requests.get(url) list2 = re.findall('yt-lockup-c.+?a\shref=".watch.v=([^"]+)".+?\s\stitle="([^"]+)"\s', req.text) list1 = list1 + list2 count = count - 1 return list1
def takeInputFortext(txt): addon = xbmcaddon.Addon('plugin.video.live.streamspro') addon_version = addon.getAddonInfo('version') profile = xbmc.translatePath(addon.getAddonInfo('profile').decode('utf-8'))
solver = InputWindow( txt=txt) solution = solver.get() return solution
class InputWindow(xbmcgui.WindowDialog): def __init__(self, *args, **kwargs):
self.txt = kwargs.get('txt','')
xbmcgui.WindowXMLDialog.__init__(self) #self.addControl(self.txt) path = xbmcaddon.Addon().getAddonInfo('path') self.kbd = xbmc.Keyboard() self.kbd.setHeading( self.txt)
def get(self): self.show() time.sleep(2) self.kbd.doModal() if (self.kbd.isConfirmed()): text = self.kbd.getText() self.close() return text self.close() return False

regex.name: lista
regex.listrepeat: <SetViewMode>55</SetViewMode> <title>$pyFunction:'[lista.param3]'.replace(".mp4", " [COLOR deeppink]Mgck[/COLOR][COLOR lime]Pi[/COLOR]").replace(".avi", " [COLOR deeppink]Mgck[/COLOR][COLOR lime]Pi[/COLOR]").replace(".mkv", "[COLOR deeppink]Mgck[/COLOR][COLOR lime]Pi[/COLOR]")</title> <link>$doregex[getUrl]</link> <thumbnail>https://i.imgur.com/aJ4O796.png</thumbnail>

regex.name: search
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import xbmc import xbmcaddon import xbmcgui def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() d = dialog.input('Busca tu pelicula o serie favorita:', type=xbmcgui.INPUT_ALPHANUM).replace(" ", "+") return d

regex.name: getUrl
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction import re , requests ,json def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):
ref = 'http://diskokosmiko.mx/' url='http://diskokosmiko.mx[lista.param1]' headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Referer': ref , 'X-Requested-With' : 'XMLHttpRequest' , 'Accept' : '*/*'} session = requests.Session() r = session.get(url, headers=headers) rv1 = r.cookies
vfile , vtoken = re.findall('action/DownloadFile.*?fileId.*?value="(.*?)".*?Token".*?value="(.*?)"', r.text)[0] data_a ={'fileId': vfile , '__RequestVerificationToken': vtoken} nr = requests.post('http://diskokosmiko.mx/action/DownloadFile?location=fi&f=%s'%vfile , headers=headers,cookies=rv1 , data=data_a).text nrj=json.loads(nr) nr = nrj['Content'] r2 = re.findall(r'(?s)value=\"(.*?)\"', nr)[0] data_a ={'__RequestVerificationToken': r2 , 'Username': 'djliptvaddon' , 'Password' : 'djliptvaddon'} nr1 = requests.post('http://diskokosmiko.mx/action/Account/Login', headers=headers,cookies = rv1 , data=data_a) print nr1.headers['Set-Cookie'] rasp = re.findall('ASPXAUTH_v2=(.*?);', nr1.headers['Set-Cookie'])[0] rv1['.ASPXAUTH_v2'] = rasp data_a ={'fileId': vfile , '__RequestVerificationToken': vtoken} nr3 = requests.post('http://diskokosmiko.mx/action/DownloadFile?location=fi&f=%s'%vfile , headers=headers, cookies = rv1 , data=data_a).text r3 = re.findall('DownloadUrl":"(.*?)"', nr3)[0] print r3 return r3

item.title: [B][COLOR gold]+[/COLOR] [COLOR deepskyblue]PELICULAS[/COLOR][/B] $doregex[makelist2] https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Andorth/cinemania/master/buscar.png search #$pyFunction import xbmc import xbmcaddon import xbmcgui def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() d = dialog.input('Buscador de peliculas', type=xbmcgui.INPUT_ALPHANUM).replace(" ", "+") return d makelist2 [COLOR white][makelist2.param3][/COLOR] $doregex[Es] https://hdfilmologia.com/[makelist2.param2] https://hdfilmologia.com/[makelist2.param2] [makelist2.param4] (?s)(.*?)< https://hdfilmologia.com/index.php?story=$doregex[search]&do=search&subaction=search SELECT #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('[COLOR lightblue]seleccione un idioma[/COLOR]', [COLOR gold]LAT[/COLOR]', ['[COLOR yellow]ESP[/COLOR]', '[COLOR blue]ING[/COLOR]') lists = ['lsrc', 'esrc', 'ssrc'] return lists[ret] Es 55 $pyFunction:'[Es.param1]'.replace("https://openload.co/embed/", "[COLOR yellow][B]OPENLOAD.CO:[/B][/COLOR]").replace("https://streamango.com/embed/", "[COLOR yellow][B]STREAMGO.COM:[/B] [/COLOR]").replace("https://www.rapidvideo.com/", "[COLOR yellow][B]RAPIDVIDEO.COM:[/B] [/COLOR]").replace("//ok.ru/videoembed/", "[COLOR yellow][B]OK.RU:[/B] [/COLOR]").replace("https://vev.io/embed/", "[COLOR yellow][B]VEV.IO:[/B] [/COLOR]").replace("https://my.mail.ru/video/embed/", "[COLOR yellow][B]MYMAIL.RU:[/B][/COLOR]") 55 $doregex[resolve_es] https://hdfilmologia.com/[makelist2.param2] https://hdfilmologia.com/[makelist2.param2] [makelist2.param4] (?s)$doregex[SELECT][0-9].*?="(https://streamcloud.*?|http://gamovideo.*?|https://openload.*?|https://powvideo.*?|https://rapidvideo.*?|https://vidoza.*?|https://streamvips.*?|https://streamango.*?|https://userscloud.*?|https://uptobox.*?|https://www.rapidvideo.*?|https://vev.*?|https://my.mail.*?|https://vev.*?|//ok.*?)" [makelist2.param1] resolve_es #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import urlresolver url = '[Es.param1]' u = urlresolver.resolve(url) return u https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Andorth/netai/master/smart/icon.png
